content.text:
> I guess Iâ€™m not sure what the difference between people with public IP addresses and a pub is. Can someone be ssb-connectable at a public IP without acting as a pub?

Yep! The main difference is that a pub's main purpose is creating and redeeming invites, whereas a feed with a public IP would usually be an Actual Person that just happens to have a public IP. I think it's just a semantics thing, but maybe there's an actual definition?
